# VEHICLE::SET_CARGOBOB_PICKUP_MAGNET_SET_TARGETED_MODE

## Summary
Set the magnet to only affect the given entity

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** cargobob
* **ENTITY_INDEX** targetEntity
